items.content_html: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.
items.title: mrshappy0/mini-mealie: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.
items.title: Johan4954/SubProbe: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: ⏰ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.
items.title: vikiboss/60s-static-host: ⏰ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: Navito (Navigate To) is a simple Vanilla JavaScript router designed to be lightweight and easy to use. It allows you to create dynamic routes and manage navigation in web applications efficiently.
items.title: MrNaceja/navito: Navito (Navigate To) is a simple Vanilla JavaScript router designed to be lightweight and easy to use. It allows you to create dynamic routes and manage navigation in web applications efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.
items.title: ayanchyaziz123/Advanced-Meeting-Intelligence-frontend: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.
items.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for scheduling tasks to execute at specific times. Features include flexible time formats, repeating tasks, custom contexts, and time helper methods. Built with AMD module pattern for easy integration into any JavaScript project.
items.title: sanyabeast/todojs: A lightweight JavaScript library for scheduling tasks to execute at specific times. Features include flexible time formats, repeating tasks, custom contexts, and time helper methods. Built with AMD module pattern for easy integration into any JavaScript project.

items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript HTTP client with powerful templating support. Makes API requests simple with preset configurations, variable substitution, and flexible response handling. Works in browser and Node.js environments.
items.title: sanyabeast/sender: Lightweight JavaScript HTTP client with powerful templating support. Makes API requests simple with preset configurations, variable substitution, and flexible response handling. Works in browser and Node.js environments.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight 3D model viewer for GLB, GLTF, FBX, OBJ, and HDR files. Built with Three.js and Electron, Preview3D offers advanced rendering options, model inspection tools, and export capabilities. Created in Kyiv, Ukraine.
items.title: sanyabeast/preview_3d: A modern, lightweight 3D model viewer for GLB, GLTF, FBX, OBJ, and HDR files. Built with Three.js and Electron, Preview3D offers advanced rendering options, model inspection tools, and export capabilities. Created in Kyiv, Ukraine.
